title: Scuba Diving
description: 08:30 Pick up from hotel, 10:00 start
Bodrum Asteria Otel Merkez
Local Lunch included, Local Drinks are extra. Alcohol forbidden
14 Years and older

title: Orak Island Group Boat Tour
description: 10:30-17:00 Starting from Bodrum Halikarnas
Lunch and Local drinks included
Transfer excluded

title: Private Boat Tours
description: Available tours between 10:00-14:00 or 12:00-16:00
Starts in Marina Bodrum Center
Goes to Black Island Aquarium Camel Beach(other options are available)
Soft drinks, fruits and lunch included(meatballs or chicken, pasta)

title: Buggy ATV Tour Standart
description: 15-20 minutes distance to Mumcular Çamadası
Standart Tour
Pick-up 14:40, Start 15:00
15Km Parkour, 1 hour and 15 minutes tour

title: Dolphin Swim
description: Need pre-reservation
15 minutes duration
Available everyday at 16:00 except Tuesday
Transfer not included

title: Fishing
description: Everyday at 09:00-13:00 on a 8,5m Zodiac Boat
Soft drinks included
Goes to Güllük are. Swimming and fishing available.
Bringing hat,towels and sunscreen are recommended

title: Fethiye Tour
description: Guests picked-up from hotels, times determined according to region. Depart from Bodrum is around at 06:30
A breakfast stop in Muğla.(Not included in the tour price, expenses during the break are extra)
After the break, destination is Fethiye
Butterfly Valley photoshooting, free time in Ölüdeniz, Saklıkent Canyon visit. Lunch are included in the tour price
Drinks and other expenses at lunch and free times are extra
Bringing swimwear, towels, sunglasses and sunscreen are recommended
On the way back, a break in Muğla again.
At the end of the tour, transport arrives to Bodrum around 20:00 and guests are taken back to their hotels
Changes may occur in the given hours due to external factors

title: Ephesus Tour
description: Guests picked-up from hotels, times determined according to region. Depart from Bodrum is around at 07:00
A breakfast stop in Bafa Lake. Not included in the tour price, expenses during the break are extra)
After the break, destination is Ephesus
Ephesus ruins entrance, guided tour of Ephesus. Lunch are included in the tour price.
Drinks and other expenses at lunch and free times are extra
Bringing hats, sunglasses and sunscreen and are recommended
Visiting the Virgin Mary is not included in the tour price. Its an extra, upon the request of the guest.
Within the tour program, we have 2 separate facility-store visits - regional product promotion.
At the end of the tour, transport arrives to Bodrum around 20:00 and guests are taken back to their hotels
On the way back, a break in Muğla again.
Changes may occur in the given hours due to external factors

title: Dalyan Tour
description: Guests picked-up from hotels, times determined according to region. Depart from Bodrum is around at 07:00
A breakfast stop in Muğla. Not included in the tour price, expenses during the break are extra)
After the break, destination is Dalyan
Mud bath with a guide, lunch, trail salt beach and a river tour by boat in Dalyan are included in the price.
Drinks and other expenses at lunch and free times are extra
Bringing swimwear, sunglasses,towel and sunscreen and are recommended
On the way back, a break in Muğla again.
At the end of the tour, transport arrives to Bodrum around 20:00 and guests are taken back to their hotels
Changes may occur in the given hours due to external factors
